review_text:
Google maps kept bringing us a block further than where it actually was. Stayed here so we could avoid all the city traffic of indianapolis.
Mary was nice and easy going. I had an interview at 11am and she gladly let me stay past the check out time to do it. Responded every time I messaged her. Great host.

Clean apartment, quiet place, near groceries, bank and pharmacy.
Mary was very kind and clear on all the answers.
I will be back!

The apartment was clean and tidy and Mary was always responsive and helpful. When we arrived the heat wasn’t on or working, which was very inconvenient in the winter. But Mary replied quickly and had someone over to fix it asap. Location is nice and overall a great stay. Only thing is the apartment does not come with any shower supplies (shampoo, soap, etc) so be sure to bring your own! Overall a nice place in Danville
This is my first time staying in the owl house. It was really hard to leave. Everything about it is perfect. The smell, the shower, the screened in porch, the bed, the small kitchen.

The cutest!! Everything about this place was fantastic and Dave was a great host. Peaceful surroundings (you can hear some road noise but it really isn't bothersome at all), everything about The Owl House was well thought out. Dave was accommodating, responsive, and so kind. Sauna was wonderful, having no TV was perfect, and the trailer bedroom was adorable (and the bed was comfy!!).
Very clean and exactly as advertised. Dave was a very friendly and responsive host!

This is what an Airbnb should be! Dave's place is clean, peaceful, has any amenities you could need, except a TV, and you don't need it. I can not recommend this place highly enough. We'll be traveling back through in June and I hope we can stay again.

We booked the Owl House for a few days in April in order to be close to 2024 total eclipse path. We absolutely loved the Owl House. Start with the clever design of the cabin around the Shasta camper and the setting in the woods on the edge of a creek valley. The windows and screen porch make the most of the woods sights and sounds. This is a birder's paradise.
The extremely clean is modern, yet rustic, small, yet spacious, uncluttered with everything you need. Beautiful lighting and furnishings in harmony with the settling. We appreciated the high quality craftsmanship and attention to detail inside and out.
The shower was a delight, the bed comfortable, the kitchen perfect, the desk space and living room all offer peaceful views of the woods. The screened porch was our favorite space of all. The cabin is set back quiet a ways from the road and there is little traffic so not much sound interrupts the birds singing.
We appreciated the wifi, but no TV.
We hope to return!

The Owl House was exactly what my wife and I were looking! We try to get away 3-4 days a quarter from our busy lives to completely disconnect and this place was perfect! The home and grounds were beautiful. The place was spotless and super tidy. Dave and Joel were very friendly and were very responsive when needed. They were readily available but respected our space and privacy. Shower, kitchen and open concept living area was amazing and The bed was super Comfy! Sleeping in the Shasta was also very cool and Unique! The 3 season room was perfect to sit and have a meal, or just relax and take in the literal owls and birds outside! My wife enjoyed reading on the hammock chair while outside! We will be coming back again as this has taken the trophy for our favorite getaway location!

My friend and I stayed at The Owl House for an AQHA show at Gordyville. His place was perfect - a 10 minute drive to our show grounds and a comfortable, serene location to relax. The RO system was a stellar touch, as was the walk-in shower, screened in porch, fireplace… the bed was as comfortable as my own at home. I would love to come back and I’m upset with myself for sharing it with so many horse show folks! ;)

The Owl House was an amazing escape from our busy life in Chicago. We wanted a place with all the amenities but still surrounded by nature, and that's exactly what we found at the Owl House. It had lots of outdoor features like fire pits, swings, a netted sunroom, and even a fireplace. The netted sunroom was especially nice because you could enjoy your morning coffee or read a book outdoors while still being covered. Inside, it had a modern cabin feel, but with a twist—the sleeping area was a Shasta camper built into the home, giving it a cozy and unique vibe. Dealing with the host, Dave, was also a pleasure. If you ever need a peaceful getaway like we did, we highly recommend this place.

This was my 2nd stay at the Owl House and won't be my last! The most peaceful surroundings, coziest fireplace, unique bedroom and restful stay. Close to home yet feels a million miles away. Thank you for your hospitality!
Such a special spot. Perfect for the much needed quiet reset and retreat I was hoping for.
Truly one of a kind!
The Owl House was exactly what my wife and I were looking for to celebrate our anniversary. Dave was responsive, knowledgeable, and extremely helpful. Thank you for providing the perfect place!
Very peaceful, cute, and cozy! Was better than the pictures!

We had a great stay. We took a walk around the property and down to the river. There was a camping kit in the draw that they let us use. While we were there we carved pumpkins and played a lot of board games. Some of the things we really liked were the swing on the porch, the trees through the windows during the fall, and the camper bed. We really enjoyed our stay. Signed, Lily-11 & Hazel-9
What a beautifully peaceful & relaxing location to make great memories. It was truly magical!!! Signed, Grandma Chris-66

We loved staying here for the weekend. The grounds were beautiful. The place was spotless. The owners were very friendly and were very responsive when needed. They were available but respected our space. Would stay again.
V cute place loved the porch and privacy.
Our time at the Owl House was great! Peaceful destination that we would recommend to anyone! Super friendly hosts!

The Owl House is amazing! It's such a unique space and a perfect break from the chaos of Chicago. We were there for a weekend and I didn't want to leave! I look forward to staying longer next time. Dave is a wonderful host, and the property is lovely. I really enjoyed the large windows and screened in porch. We saw deer and way too many birds to count. It's a great place to stargaze and really relax. Owl House was spotless and ready for our arrival. The whole experience was exactly what we needed. Five stars!

I highly recommend the Owl House. It has a lot of windows and a screened porch that overlooks the woods. The setting is incredibly peaceful. The hosts are sweet & kind. if you are looking for a quiet getaway...this is the right place.
I love staying at The Owl House. Dave & Debbie are the perfect hosts!

We were warmly greeted by Dave when we arrived. It was a great getaway for our Anniversary. We enjoyed the screened-in porch. We spent most of our time out there. I could have slept in the hammock. It was so comfortable! My husband loved all of the cedar wood that was inside. The vintage camper that we slept in was very cool. The king bed was amazingly comfortable. It had everything that they said it would, and the accommodations more than exceeded our expectations.. We enjoyed watching all the birds and nature. On our last morning we even saw a pileated woodpecker. It was very peaceful and relaxing. We would definitely recommend for a quiet and relaxing getaway.
Ps: We even found the best steakehouse around. Longbranch Steakhouse in Gifford, IL. It's family owned and operated.
We had a great time at The Owl House. Very cute and unique. Very private. Dave & Debbie are super friendly and very gracious. We love staying at both of their locations.

Owl House was so peaceful! The Shasta was a super fun touch. We love staying at this property, and highly recommend it for an amazing getaway. We also visit Sonrise Farms and Prairie Fruits and Farm to bring home goodies after our stay.

We had a wonderful time at the owl house, if you're looking for a place in the area I highly recommend it. The hosts were wonderful and the accommodations were superb. We especially enjoyed sitting on the enclosed porch and melting into the hammock swing.
We were in the area for a graduation at University of Illinois which was a very doable drive. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay, we hope to be back in the future!

A Peaceful and Unique refuge. I recently stayed at The Owl House for Mom’s Weekend at UIUC. At just over 30 minutes out of town, Owl House was a wonderful retreat from the hustle and bustle. Everything was sparkling clean. The view off of the porch is so pretty and the porch itself is such a pleasant place to hang out especially with morning coffee. The Shasta is SUCH a fun touch. The bed is comfy and it felt like glamping with the working camper windows open to allow the cool spring air in. Great LARGE rainfall shower and bathroom with plenty of space. The open concept living area with fireplace was a great place to hang out in the evening after returning from our day. We really loved our stay.
The Owl House was just what we needed and excepted for the weekend. Clean, quiet and cozy! We would love to return.
Super cozy, clean and quiet!

Our family had a wonderful time here. Very clean, well kept and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. Loved the kitchen.
Highly recommend staying here.
Very quite and charming place. Got a lot of work done.
Great cozy place.
The cottage is adorable and very clean! The beds were comfy. There was plenty of blankets and towels. Katelyn is quick to respond. Highly recommend!

The cottage was AMAZING. It was old school charm and super cozy. Katelyn even had a Christmas tree up and cute decorations throughout. We definitely felt at home. The location was perfect and I’m just sad we didn’t have time to eat s’mores by the fire.
Awesome cabin with even better hospitality. Wouldn’t hesitate for a second to recommend!
Great place, wonderful yard

Adorable and cozy! Super clean, great amenities, very comfortable beds. The house was easy to find. Katelyn was quick to respond when we accidentally locked ourselves out. Overall a very enjoyable stay!

Katelyn's cottage was a pleasant surprise with such charm! The pictures don't do it justice! It was in immaculate condition with adorable farmhouse decor inside and out. The furniture and beds were extremely comfortable with good quality bedding and linens, which I appreciated so much. There's a TV in each room, she provided grilling and outdoor supplies, had all necessary kitchen utensils and supplies, and offered good quality coffee in the morning. My daughters got to thoroughly enjoy the swing set, but my only regret was not arriving with enough time to enjoy the fire and s'mores she had set up so nicely for us! It was conveniently located to the interstate, easy to find, and close enough to town that there were many door dash options. We will definitely be staying here again the next time we have a trip out that way. I highly recommend staying here, you will be so happy you did!

Stayed a few times here now. Love it every time. So peaceful and relaxing. I’ll stay here every time I come to the area if it’s available.
Very homey and comfortable and the hosts are nice, responsive, and have gone to lengths for renters to have a great experience. My hat is off to them!
Good location in town but felt like you were secluded out in the country. The hosts were quick to respond and great. This was a good place for our family of four to get away for the night.
this was our second stay here. perfect location for us, comfortable clean bed, and we can bring our dogs.
Beautiful cabin set in a slice of country paradise. Lots of outdoor seating, a fire pit, horse shoes. Heard turkey in the woods as I enjoyed the fresh morning air. Nice!
This is a simple old fashion cabin with charm. We needed a quiet night's rest and we found it at the càbin. Would definitely stay again. Remember, simple and comfortable.
Private and very relaxing cabin! Beautiful trees surround the property. Everything was just perfect and we really enjoyed our stay!
We had a wonderful stay at the Cabin! Would definitely stay again.
So private and we loved it!! One of our best stops on the way home to PA.
Great stay
Very relaxing. Quaint cabin. Enjoyed my stay and will certainly stay again anytime I’m in this area needing lodging.
We love the outdoor areas, especially the fire pit and complimentary wood! We made peanut butter smores and many memories!
The host was super helpful! Very quiet are and perfect for dog owners. Large yard with trees etc. Beautiful bon fire pit with loads of stacked wood. Enjoyed the stay immensely.
Super location and great for pets

Rustic and serene are the perfect words to describe this lovely little cabin. It was peaceful and private, and really just a lovely little getaway in a lovely set of woodland along the river. They had a great biodiversity of trees and understory plants, and wildlife was aplenty, we saw several bird species, including a full showing of wild turkeys- males displaying and all!
Hosts were very clear in instructions to enter and check out and it was obvious that they thought of all the little things- fire pit, unlimited firewood, various board games and activities and a great DVD selection, with lots of cozy blankets. They provided great food and drink recommendations, and everything was cozy and comfortable.
My only recommendation for fellow “cold feet” folks would be to make sure you pack your slippers (I forgot mine!) because the floor gets a little cold, but they had plenty of soft, warm blankets and area rugs to make it all comfy nonetheless.
Thank you to the wonderful hosts!
Enjoyed our stay.
Love staying here.

We loved this cabin! It was very rustic and authentic. Lots of history and personal touches by the host!!
The outside is amazing and such a beautiful escape from the city!! Really happy we found this place and would highly recommend for a unique escape and little cabin feel 😊
We didn’t realize 2 would be sleeping on recliners or sleeping bags, so maybe keep that in mind. It would be perfect for 2 and you can make it work for 4 like we did! 😉
Our kids really loved the games to play.
Thank you Eric & Lindsey for a cozy place to stay!
Always a pleasure to stay here!

My husband and I absolutely enjoyed our stay and our little puppy too. It was very cozy and relaxing. we have been married for 41 years come August and we try to do these little getaway trips every so often to relax and refocus since we work so much. This was one of our best trips. It was a little chilly but I sat out on the porch early morning in the rocker drinking my coffee, it was so calm. The place had little extras that were very nice. Their hospitality was amazing!! Thanks again Eric and Lindsey for your great little cabin!🏚️
~The Shepard's ~
Lindsey and Eric’s place is a perfect in town escape and the dogs love it!
Very peaceful and comfortable.
Always a great place to spend a night!
Lindsey and Eric were gracious hosts. This is a wonderful place to get away without going very far. 5 out of 5 recommend.
Love this place!

This was our second stay at this cabin. We came back because we love it so much! It is a great way to unplug and be in nature. It has everything needed to not have to go anywhere. Check in and check out is so simple and we appreciate the privacy of this cabin. I’m certain we will be staying at this location again

The lack of water pressure is what keeps this review from 5 stars. This is something that might be out of LindseyandErice's control. Other than this, we would stay at LindseyandEric's again! Their place is way above any other place around Danville. . . . . . . .in terms of being quiet, safe, and clean.

The hosts were very responsive and made the check in and entry very easy. They also made an early check in available to be flexible with my schedule. When I got there, they had written a very nice sympathy note due to my grandmother’s passing. Everything was clean and comfortable. They even had extra space heaters and blankets to use during this cold weather.
Always enjoy this place
This is a great spot to stay while traveling! The hosts are so friendly and accommodating, and the surroundings are cozy.
we had an amazing rinenand hope to return soon 🤗
Always a great place to stay!
Place was recommended to me. Wonderful and would stay again if brought back to the area.

the house is small and set back off the road. it was perfect for the two of us and our two dogs. the bed is FIRM but oddly comfortable. If visiting in winter bring slippers as the floor is concrete and can get chilly. all in all great stay and we will be back

Lindsey and Eric's cabin was perfect for a quick anniversary getaway! So peaceful and quiet. Felt like we were in the woods but it is right off interstate. We also enjoyed a wonderful dinner at Possum Trot just down the road.

What a great place. It was such a great cabin and so cute and clean. I look forward to staying there again. And to top it off Lindsey and eric are amazing hosts and so accommodating. One of my favorite places so far! Thanks again
Peace and Quiet

Quick one night stay for us at this cozy place! It was peaceful and private. The bed very comfortable. I loved the little touches such as; space heater, extra blankets, snacks, ramen, candle, coffee, popcorn and more! This place is very dog friendly! We highly recommend this cabin!
Another great stay!
Thanks L&E! I love this place and will be sure to visit again.
Another great stay at this beautiful cabin in the woods. Our family enjoyed playing with Lincoln logs in this quiet oasis. Perfect size for a family of four with littles- can’t recommend it enough!

My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our weekend at Eric and Lindsey‘s rustic cabin in the woods. Was exactly what the pictures look like it was peaceful, relaxing we went hunting together and Covington antique shopping and Danville and Covington ate dinner at the beef House and the possum trot two of the best meals that I’ve ever had I highly recommend this cabin for a weekend Peaceful, relaxing getaway.
The cabin was cute and comfortable as described. We loved the remote and peaceful atmosphere. Lindsey and Eric were great communicators and responsive to our questions.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this cabin in the woods! The kids loved it and enjoyed playing with the Lincoln Logs. We had them set up in the living area and us in the bedroom which worked out perfect because the bathroom is accessed though the bedroom.
We’ll definitely be staying here again!
My third time staying here ! Love to stop here and have a little piece of quiet on a long road trip. Comfortable and always feels really welcoming and clean !
Great place for chill and relax. My dog had very great time. Will visit again.
Exactly what I needed, and exactly as described. It is a private place to get away.
Sweet little cabin in a convenient but relatively secluded location.

Another great stay at Lindsey and Eric’s! My husband and I already agreed we would 110% stay here again when back in the area next year. After each of hiking or hunting at nearby parks it was wonderful to come back “home” to take a hot shower, make dinner, and relax.

We loved, loved, loved this little cabin!! It was SO quiet and peaceful. We had been on the road for several days and this was just what we needed to relax and unwind. Our dogs also loved the wide open space to run and explore. Sad it was too cold to enjoy the porch and fire pit areas. With or without pets I would 100% recommend this cabin. We will be staying here again for sure!!
As always our stay was lovely 😊

Lovely little overnight stop at this cozy cabin. Lindsey & Eric were extremely helpful and genuinely make guests feel welcome. The cabin was comfy, clean and well equipped. Wish we'd had more time to enjoy the fire pit area, but we did have a great walk in the surrounding woods.
We loved the character of this place. It is very private with plenty of great outdoor seating and dry firewood to enjoy the yard. We enjoyed our stay and we will be back!

Perfect location and home away from home for our outdoorsy weekends at a nearby State Park. We loved having a comfortable place to come back to at the end of the day to warm up and relax. Even though the home is right outside of Danville, the setting is tucked into the woods and very private and quiet.

What a pleasant surprise. On the edge of Danville and a very outdoorsy setting. Lots of open spaces around the cabin for corn hole toss, bocce ball, horse shoes or just throwing the ball for your pet. I mean really throwing it! The cabin backs up against acres of woods as it stretches down into a valley.. The vintage of the cabin is old and interior and exterior are very unique in decor and design.
Because of its location it has easy access to Danvilles amenities, antique shops, one of a kind cafes / restaurants, a wine
vineyard and nearby an off grid brewery. Again all nearby your cabin while taking advantage of beautiful area state and local parks and bike trail.
This cabin is near our route to and from Minnesota and North Carolina. With an active young dog it is also the perfect place to stay at a great night(s) rate. As traveling seniors and grandparents we love this type of place. We will stay here often on our travels to and from Charlotte.

It was a quick stay for us, one night, but we loved the private surroundings. Way better than any hotel! The place was clean, comfy and just what we wanted. Loved the rustic decor and the flexibility of having our dog with us. Would definitely stay here again if in the area. Even though our stay was short we still got in a hike at Kickapoo State Park and enjoyed a local brewery.
The place was awesome. Definitely would plan on going back down the road
The perfect place!
I can't wait to return!! Such a beautiful spot!!
A simple fall getaway surrounded by beautiful trees! A cute cabin retreat with the right amount of comfort.
Great little place for a quick trip.

What a great little place. We were just traveling through but this was a wonderful place to relax after a long day of driving. It feels like you are in the woods while in a subdivision. Comfortable bed. Everything we needed. Thank you very much.
Always a good place to stay.
I loved this place! Very cozy and homey and my dogs loved the very large and private area!
They were great hosts. We definitely plan on returning!

Such a sweet little get away! They did an amazing job turning this little space into a cozy hideaway.
Loved my morning on the rockers outside!
Such a peaceful and wonderful place.
I did have an issue that there was no hot water. In communications with the host, that has been repaired. I would stay there in the future.

We love staying here! Our hosts are the best, very kind & caring. The location is near the interstate & easy to get to. Close to many local parks & attractions. The best part for us is the peace, quiet & beauty of the location.

This cabin is absolutely charming. We needed to stay close to home, but still get away. It is beautiful and relaxing and I would definitely recommend this to another family or individual that needs a peaceful getaway!

Lindsey and Eric’s place was w wonderful place to stay at for a short girls weekend. It was privet and peaceful. We loved the campfire and seating outside. We would definitely stay here again if in the area.
Nice and clean
amazing place to stay and a perfect getaway for couples and family
Always a pleasure!
Another great stay here to get in some nature therapy away from the city. The cabin is always clean and quiet. We just love sitting on the porch with our dog and listening to the rain.

What a WONDERFUL spot! Such a pleasant surprise to turn off the little road into a little woodsy haven! Rustic in the best way! The cabin is darling, like something out of a storybook. PEACE and Quiet in a BEAUTIFUL, private little setting. The shower is warm, the bed is comfy, and there's little extra "welcome" touches inside! So very clean too! Go ahead and add an extra day to your trip because you won't want to leave!

We enjoyed our stay, were very comfortable and cozy and would stay again.
thanks Lindsey & Eric.
Second stay. Always enjoyable and perfect for couples with pets.
We were only there overnight during a road trip, but everything was as described, and we would stay there again.
Thank you for hosting us again!
Great cabin! We had everything we needed. The surroundings were beautiful- and our dog loved it too!
This is the best hidden gem anyone who wants to have the secluded but still be close to all the shops and stores, then this is the place for you!! I loved my stay here with my hubby!
Beautiful Cabin! Lindsey and Eric were responsive and quick with any questions. Cabin had a huge yard great for my puppies, and was super cute and clean. Wish we could stay longer!
Very beautiful, very relaxing while we were there. It was a wedding weekend for us, so when we were there it was very relaxing…

A safe and slightly secluded location which was exactly what we were looking for. There is plenty of outside seating and good firepit area. We enjoyed our stay very much and will book again when renting in Danville.
We definitely enjoyed our stay here. It was extremely peaceful and private. There are also nice state parks in the area.

What a gem! We absolutely loved staying in this cottage during our move across the country. Would definitely come back to this airbnb when we’re in the area. Our dog had the best time of her life running around! I love the fact that they had all these dvd’s (nostalgia) available to watch on their tv. Everything was very clean and nicely organized! They recommended going to the MadGoat Coffee shop, so we did and it’s definitely worth the visit (great coffee and some nice breakfast choices). Wish we had time to make a fire and stargaze, next time!!
Great place! Love the environment! Well kept and lots to do on the property!
Great place to stay and relax!
We had such a peaceful stay! The cabin was cozy, clean, well decorated, the bed was super comfy! Beautiful property, our dogs and us loved it. Thank you!
Comfortable accommodations in a peaceful setting.
I can't express enough how thankful I am to have found this little cabin. It was a great quiet place to bring family together for a special occasion.

We had a wonderful stay at this cottage! it was very quiet and felt secluded, even though it wasn't removed from everything else. It was super clean and we were lacking for nothing. We were disappointed that we didn't have a fire at least one night, but only because it was super hot already! There are lots of games and dads at the cabin, but also lots of activities within a few miles. Loved out stay and hoping to go back next year. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
We had a lovely stay. Easy to follow instructions, quiet location, with lots of games!
nice, clean and perfect to relax and the hosts are friendly and responded quickly

This is the best Airbnb by far. It is so beautiful, peaceful, and restful. The wooded surroundings are everything. The cabin itself is cozy and has everything you need. Even without WiFi, I was able to work (including Zoom calls) using my phone’s hotspot. We loved the porch swing, hammock, and paths into the woods. We ate dinner outside at the picnic table. We slept really well. What a wonderful experience. We hope to return soon.

Very fun, unique stay. The place is exactly as described. Loved the space in the yard. Bonfire material was dry, well-split, and ready for us. Saw 7-8 deer in the yard one evening. Lots of lightening bugs in the evening. Great place for a couple nights. Thanks so much!!
Perfect for our family. Lots of fun activities around and loved the fire pit.

This was my third stay at the cabin. My husband was with me this time and he absolutely loved the trails surrounding the property, the peacefulness and the privacy, as I knew he would. As always it was a wonderful stay.
Great cabin and beautiful land in the woods. Super responsive hosts. Lots of land for dogs to run and explore on.
Had a great stay here! Would definitely return!

We enjoyed the peace and quiet of the cabin. It had everything we needed for our stay and the setting was private and quiet. Our only visitor was a buck who wandered through the yard occasionally and he seemed to feel right at home too.

Great little getaway! Very pleased with how peaceful and relaxing the place was. All we could hear were the birds and squirrels. Very clean inside and had everything we needed for a nice vacation. Also a really great movie selection. Highly recommend and will hope to stay here again in the future!

What an awesome little gem...tucked away, thrown back in history. This is a fabulous little settlers cabin, in what seems like all alone in the woods. Complimentary furnishings to remind of a prior time. Comfortable, cozy, and clean. Nice set-up to sit outside and have a meal, enjoy a fire, or just listen to the birds and take in the surrounding nature. I didn't see if there was wifi, so that might be an issue for some...my 5G worked fine.
The hosts were responsive and helpful. Truly enjoyed the stay and looking forward to coming back again.
Great place for a little getaway, to relax and reset. Had a very peaceful time with my dog.
Beautiful and serene backyard!
The cabin is in a beautiful setting. Would recommend any one staying here. Lindsey was quick to reply to any of my questions. Bed mattress very comfortable. Everything was well stocked for our use.
Loved stopping through here again on my way back to Massachusetts from Minnesota. Very quiet and peaceful, such a sweet spot to stop. Would definitely stay here again if I’m in the area.
We woke up this morning with 5 deer 🦌 in the backyard. Beautiful setting. Very nice, clean, beautifully decorated cottage in the woods. Very relaxing!

My husband and I enjoyed the beautiful, cozy, & relaxing atmosphere of the property. The cabin was so cute, cozy, and clean. The outdoor space is perfect. So many places to sit and enjoy the sounds of nature. Would absolutely stay again!
This was the perfect little getaway from the city. Our dogs loved it so much!
We absolutely love this spot!!
Wonderful place and hosts!

Loved staying here ! After a long day of driving in a very hot car with no ac, we couldn’t have been happier to reach this sweet spot. I wish we could have stayed longer, but that just means we’ll have to come back through ! Thanks Lindsey and Eric for offering such a peaceful setting!
The perfect oasis for my family! The location is ideal and would love to come back again! 10/10 recommend!
great place. very peaceful.
great place. very peaceful.

The cabin is exactly how it is described and a nice, peaceful place to turn to after several hours of driving (like in our case) or a very busy week at work. The house has the feeling of an old barn or an old cabin and is very comfortable and suited the two of us (and our dog) perfectly. Comfortable bed and updated bathroom. The kitchen is basic as an invitation to use the grill or the fireplace instead. Most of all, Lindsey and Eric are very gracious hosts, very responsive and caring. We had a great stay and would recommend their place.
Beautiful, quiet private space surrounded by woods and singing birds. The cabin is comfortable and had what we needed. Highly recommended!
Beautiful location that was so peaceful. We enjoyed an outdoor fire. The home was cozy with a very comfortable bed. We saw a deer go by one night.
Very private and peaceful. Clean. Lovely outdoor areas too. Pretty sweet having a trail right on the property. Great hosts
Always a pleasure!

Lindsey and Eric were very helpful on questions that I had. Absolutely beautiful and peaceful! Wish it would have been a little warmer to be outside more .. will definitely come back another time!
If you are in the area… this is definitely the place to go!

It’s been about two years since we booked and it’s always fun to see what thoughtful touches they add to the space. We love to get away from the city for a mental health break in nature and their cabin is in such a great area for outdoor activities. Lindsey is a awesome host!

This is such a cute little cabin and was very peaceful! It is a gem of a place and just what we needed for our Anniversary getaway. Easy check-in process. Everything was clean. There were very thoughtful amenities scattered throughout the cabin (phone charger -my husband had forgotten his, games, sound machine, extra blankets, space heaters, books, some snacks, and coffee, popcorn, lots of DVDs to watch, etc.) I could go on and on. I have literally never stayed at a place that put so much thought into making someone’s stay so comfortable, convenient, and homey. The hosts were very welcoming, friendly, and responsive to my messages. We would love to visit this little slice of heaven again!
Cute place that provided a quiet get away. Very clean and Lindsey and Eric were very easy to communicate with. Felt very welcome.

It was the best stay for my husband, corgi, and I on our cross country move from VA. We were able to check in easily, great communication, and private area making it a home feeling. It was rainy and we only stayed the night, so we weren't able to use the firepit. It was close to the main street.
Wonderful, peaceful stay. Thank you. ❤️
Great little cabin. Perfect spot to rest after a long day of traveling!

This little cabin was perfect for what we wanted. I wish the Chicago traffic would have let us spend more daylight here. I would've loved to start a fire. The guest book was a great idea and gave it a personal touch. We appreciated the rice Krispy treat and fruit by the foot. Will definitely consider again when we find ourselves in he area. Thank you!
The serene and rustic cabin is just that—and also very comfortable and well-equipped. The woodland setting is lovely, and the hosts are very responsive and accommodating. We highly recommend it!
Always a great stay!

we had a great time here
Fantastic farmhouse and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Very clean and super cute!!! We would definitely stay there again.
Great location and nice place to stay!
Nice place to stay when in the area. Beds and bedding are comfortable and lots of little special touches through the building. Great communication from property manager.
Interesting building located on a farm. Very clean and well supplied. Enjoyed my stay!
A beautiful farm setting. Great for a family. Two bedrooms that are directly connected, a large kitchen, and a nice living room.
Nice little spot for a getaway.
Gorgeous place with wonderful forest view from the screened in back porch. Two fire pits and river access. Dave was very friendly and helpful. Lots of cool wildlife. Plus an awesome sauna!

My son and I had an amazing stay at the Wren House! It was so comfortable and peaceful! My son even fished in the river and I saw a ton of wildlife, including a bald eagle!! 🦅 We can’t wait to return! Thank you!!
Loved this place!! It is extremely peaceful not too far from Urbana-Champaign. The hammocks and seeing all the birds there were my favorite parts!

This was the second time my mom sister, and I had stayed at the Wren House. It is a perfect space for the three of us to enjoy time together, relaxing and listening to birds in the woods. Thank you, Dave.

What a peaceful place for a weekend away! Dave was a wonderful host, very responsive and helpful. The space itself is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy nature. We took a walk along the river and loved the screened in porch. Close enough to town if you need it, but private enough to feel a world away. Would definitely recommend!
Beautiful getaway for anyone looking to unplug, bird watch and enjoy nature!

What a beautiful place to stay for the eclipse! we had 98% totality from the little river viewing spot where the campfire pit is at. it was so peaceful to be at this Airbnb; the sauna was pristine and so nice to use!
longer walking trails were a bit further away than expected but we did enjoy walking all along the acreage! The wren house is attached to the host's house but it still very private and cozy. The host's also respected our space and we felt very secluded. Will come back again someday! thanks!
Absolutely beautiful place in a lovely setting. Peaceful, but not too far away from larger cities with lots of activities. We enjoyed our stay and would love to come again!
Very nice a serene, relaxing place to get away. Appreciate the host accuracy of description. Had a great stay and would recommend.
spotless, had everything we needed and more. We will defiantly stay again.
Very peacful
lovely place in all senses of the word -- hope to see it in all seasons.

The Wren house is a peaceful haven in the woods. With the river nearby, the sunlight pouring in, and sauna to enjoy, I left feeling truly replenished. Hosts are warm, hospitable, available and helpful! I highly recommend this space for a peaceful getaway.
Amazing home and such kind hosts!! Beautiful scenery and very clean!! Loved it!!

Wren House was as peaceful and relaxing as always! I mentioned to Dave how lovely it is to be greeted by the aroma of cedar woodwork when you step inside. We enjoyed a camp fire by the water and hiked at Forest Glen Preserve, Kennekuk County Park, and Kickapoo State Park, and had a sauna after being out in the woods all day. Thanks for creating such a lovely retreat! —Ellie
Very nice house! Dave is very kind and helpful. I really recommend this place to stay with family.

We had such a beautiful and peaceful stay at the Wren house. Me and my family loved how quiet and private it was. The view of the woods was amazing and it even stormed while we were there so we got to enjoy the sounds of the rain. The location is attached to their home and I was actually very nervous about this because we have two toddlers and I honestly didn’t want to bother them. The only complaint I have is the water pressure is very low and you can’t run any other water if someone is trying to shower. Despite that we really loved the space and area.
Awesome weekend getaway. Love being in nature!!!! The space is beautiful.
Our experience far exceeded what we expected. We will definitely return to this place for another getaway. The fall colors were amazing! Perfect time of year for this place!

My family and I we have a wonderful time together. The meaning of the founding peace, relax and better relationship between us.
Thank you

The place is fantastic. So peaceful and beautiful both in terms of the space itself and the outdoor surroundings. I really enjoyed the sauna and the screened porch, especially. Just perfect for relaxing solitude. Can't wait to be back on another visit.
Perfect weekend getaway less than an hour from Champaign. Debbie and Dave have done an amazing job at creating a beautiful space to share and they were great hosts. Highly recommend!

Nice little place to get away. Plenty acres to relax on, property borders the river, enjoyed one evening by the river and fire. State park not too far with plenty of lakes. Kennekuk County Park and lake vermillion require a $13 daily pass for all watercraft.

A very peaceful stay. Reasonably close to Champaign-Urbana but in another world. The birds sounds and nature views were wonderful. The space is clean and uncluttered and a perfect getaway. The porch swings were especially enjoyable!
The Wren House was a beautiful home surrounded by nature. The screened in porch with 2 chair hammocks was extremely peaceful.

Debbie and Dave are wondering people! They were so nice and always available. We stayed at the Wren House and it was even more beautiful then the pictures showed! If we ever come back to the area, I will definitely make sure to stay with them again!

One of the nicest property’s I have ever stayed. If you are looking for a private spot with lots of nature, this is the place that you should book! Will definitely be returning to this location. The hosts were amazing people. Felt right at home. Loved the sauna as well!
This is our 2nd time at Debbie’s place and it was just as amazing this time as last!
Deb and Dave are great host. We can’t wait for our next stay.
Beautiful quiet retreat near a lovely river.

We had a very pleasant stay! Debbie and Dave were lovely to visit with and very welcoming! The beautiful tall trees blowing in the wind by the river were breathtaking and peaceful. Will definitely be back! My wife loved the scent free linens and the towels that actually dried us off.
Wonderful place to stay. Very serene and comfortable. Great hosts and very responsive and helpful. I really enjoyed my stay.
My family came for graduation, and they loved having a beautiful, private, peaceful place to stay! They already want to stay again. Thank you!

Wren house was beautiful and peaceful. We loved the wide variety of birds. Bring your binoculars for bird watching from a cozy porch. The hosts are lovely people and provide a lovely Airbnb experience. Our autistic adult son enjoyed the porch swings and the quiet restful space. The scent free linens and towels were also wonderful to have. Would love to have another long stay at Wren house. Restful and delightful.
Enjoyed my time here resting and listening to birds.

I cannot say enough wonderful things about our hosts Debbie and Dave! We were met at the house upon arrival with a lot of helpful Information and enthusiasm, as if we were family. The home is well appointed, comfortable with the peacefulness of the woods and birds at your reach. They allowed up to pick vegetables from their garden and to tour their new guesthouse on the property called the Owl House, where they incorporated a 1963 Shasta camper into the build of the home and is the the master bedroom. Thank you for allowing us to stay, until next time.

Debbie and her husband were very polite and was very quick to respond to any questions I had. The property very clean and peaceful with the screened in porch. I would definitely come back again for a relaxing weekend escape again!

From start to finish, A+. I had some issues with the website (I'm newer to airbnb) and Debbie was very patient, communicative, and helpful. Throughout really, great communication, and very nice to work with. The place was gorgeous, clean, had everything it needed and no more. The location was really quiet, we absolutely felt at home, more at-home than we sometimes do at our actual home. Debbie was very responsive when we had questions, but mostly she set things up well enough for us to be autonomous and happy. Easy-peasy, A+, spent the car ride back home chatting about when we might be able to come back and visit again!! 🙏
A lovely spot in the woods with a river close by and lots of birds and other wildlife. Would highly recommend this place.

We loved our stay! The space was more beautiful than the photos, and the setting was so serene. The beds were comfortable, and no detail was overlooked. Debbie was so helpful and friendly—a perfect host! The whole family, setting and story behind it is a treasure. We will definitely be staying again.
Great Stay!

This place was amazing. It was beautiful inside and out. I would live to stay again. The Debbie and her husband do an amazing job at making you feel at home while you are there. The place was immaculate and the property it's on is beautiful. Thank you so much. We will see you again next year when the horse show is back in town.

My adult kids and I spent the weekend in Wren House to mark the anniversary of my husbands passing. Debbie and Dave went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed and comfortable. It is a beautiful and peaceful setting, and everything was spotless. - the perfect place to unwind and recharge. If you love bird watching, this is the place to be, and the swing chairs on the deck are wonderful - even in January bundled up in a blanket with a cup of tea!
The sauna was a real treat! You can feel the love that has gone into designing and building this space - so many little touches that make it special. The red cedar used throughout is beautiful and I’m sold on underfloor heating!
We will definitely come back and highly recommend Wren House.

Wren House was a great experience! The views in every room were amazing. Wish the weather was a bit warmer so we could enjoy more of the hammocks. Definitely would love to be back, I can see there’s definitely a lot more to explore and do with nice weather! Debbie was so great with responding with all the questions we had, very friendly! There’s no tv, but for us it was no issue at all. We played lots of card games, (Debbie and Dave did provide uno and a deck of cards which was nice to have extra) and enjoyed each others company! Definitely what we wanted was quite, away from all the chaos and wren house absolutely did that for us. Do plan ahead to bring plenty of groceries because there really isn’t anything near besides a Casey’s gas station and dollar store as Debbie explained in her description. We didn’t plan on stepping out at all so we had no issues with that :)
Overall enjoyed our weekend stay and would recommend to anyone!

All I can say is, wow! This trip far exceeded our expectations.
First and foremost - the property is perfect. The home is attached to the hosts home but separated by two garages which offers the feeling of total privacy. The living area, bedroom, and porch look out to a river that is not only beautiful, but the sounds make you feel completely at peace.
We got lucky with phenomenal weather and had the pleasure of seeing a stray cat, tons of entertaining squirrels, and an array of birds (including a crane, a wood pecker, and a hawk). If you love nature, take this opportunity to live only a couple windows within it in a beautiful space.
The house is cozy and feels right at home. No TV, which is okay if you love the person you’re with because there is more than enough to see and talk about.
When I texted and asked Debbie for Tylenol, she had it delivered to the door in less than five minutes. How awesome! No doubt we will be coming back.
Thanks Debbie & Dave, you were so kind!
Another great stay at the Wren House!
Wren House is a lovely, peaceful, retreat and we will definitely be back! We had a fire, hiked around Kickapoo State Park and also Kennekuk County Park, sauna-ed and generally relaxed. Thanks!!

A very peaceful and clean place to stay, the screened-in patio and hammock chair swing were perfect for sitting with a hot cup of coffee or tea and admiring the woods and the birds. The large windows in the kitchen let a lot of light in when the sun was out and the high ceilings made the space feel very spacious.

We loved our weekend in the Wren house! The place was super clean, had everything stocked, and had a beautiful view. Hosts were super helpful in anything we needed and we felt right at home. We will definitely be back to visit!
Cozy, comfortable and calming! That’s the best way I can sum up the Wren house :) This is a slice or nature at its best. Thank you Debbie for hosting us!

Our stay was wonderful. The house is so beautiful and comfortable. Definitely want to stay the next time we come to town. Our hosts were wonderful. Only recommendation would be to have games and a radio. We bought dice and Uno and had great nights as a family playing.

we had a great stay, a couple of things that people should be aware of. First the house should really be listed as a guest house. it is connected to the host main house. you do have your own entrance and the host gave us our privacy and it is separated by the garage. Second, you have to contact the host to use the sauna. Third and this is completely out of anyone's control but if you come at the beginning of October the two oak trees above the house might be dropping acorns. Three of the 4 nights we were there we had acorns pelting the roof. They sounded like rocks hitting the roof and in the middle of the night they will wake you up. this isn't the fault of the host but it is a risk you take coming in the fall. The house was very clean and we loved sitting on the porch and listening to the birds and watching the squirrels. We even had a visit from a woodchuck. We really enjoyed our stay, but just a few things to know when you book.
We had a great stay at Debbie’s while attending a wedding nearby! We made use of the screened porch and sauna, and loved the decorations. This place is exactly what we needed for a weekend getaway.

I really enjoyed staying at the Wren House. At first I was a little disappointed when I didn't see a television. However, after spending the first morning enjoying the peacefulness on the screened porch, that all changed. My time at the cabin was very restful, which was really what I needed, especially having only two days between the long trip coming and going on. The cabin was very clean and cozy and had everything I needed. Debbie and Dave were very gracious. I really appreciated their sincerity in wanting my wife to come and enjoy the Wren house with me. When she couldn't and we thought my brother was coming, I appreciated their genuine kindness in saying he was more than welcome to come and stay. Debbie was quick to respond any time I messaged her with a question. She was very helpful and friendly. I had traveled to the area for a family reunion and didn't have time to enjoy the sauna and the other amenities, this time. Hopefully, I'll be able to return with my wife next year and get a chance to enjoy them then. Thank you Debbie and Dave for providing a nice place to rest.

My stay in the Wren House was blissful! Debbie & Dave thoughtfully designed the cottage with a variety of R&R getaway comforts in mind. I felt at home and pampered every minute. The very friendly hosts were always just a text away for any need or question I might have. My favorite place to relax was on the nature-surrounded, fully screened in porch. I cannot wait to return.

Debbie’s place really was cozy. It has the potential to be something extraordinary. A great relaxing place. Just a few things I think the viewers should look out for. It is connected somewhere to their main property house. So the Wren house is further in the back of the property. Also wasn’t a lot of nature to view in the surroundings, those are places you can visit. And one last thing, it might’ve just been the storm they recently had, Debbie does mention this in her listing about the bugs, mostly spiders and some other insects, we did go over with Debbie about treating the property Because….bugs want to be cozy as well lol. Other than that nice property, very good host accommodating, loved spirit the dog. But just some things to keep in mind especially if you want to be somewhat secluded on your own. Though they give you your privacy , It’s good to know their property is somewhat connected to the Wren house in the rear.
The wren is wonderful experience. The access to river was great. The place is very clean and fresh. The screened porch was the highlight of our stay. We pretty much lived out there.
Excellent stay - perfect peaceful get-away with great hosts.
Great place to relax in nature!

Oh, how we love the Wren House! A friend and I stayed at this beautiful cabin for a few days to get away from the busyness of life and do some writing. PERFECT SPOT. Debbie and Dave are wonderful hosts and the cabin is charming with just the right amount of minimalism while well stocked and comfortable. Love the screened-in porch and can't wait to come back.

This is the perfect place to stay in East Central Illinois. The house is perfectly clean, every detail has been thought of and it’s such a relaxing place to be. The hosts are amazing. They were both so kind and willing to share information with us and always welcoming us to ask questions or ask if we needed anything. We didn’t really need much because they had done such a great job of thinking of all of those details. If you visit this area, I highly recommend this location for your visit.
What a wonderful and relaxing get away.

Simply delightful. Walking in and smelling the wonderful aroma of the red cedar. Peaceful surroundings. Private. Quiet. The porch was our absolute favorite!!! Loved relaxing in the hammocks and listening to the sounds of nature! Hosts were wonderful! 🤍

Dave and Debbie’s place was a great place for us to call home while visiting my family! The owners were quite a bit closer than we had initially thought, but they made us feel at home. The grounds are absolutely gorgeous. I loved starting every day listening to the sounds of nature while hanging out on a hammock. My 3 year old loved the house but was a bit apprehensive of the stairs and how steep they are. We loved staying and wish we had a bit more time to explore! I definitely recommend staying here. They are even constructing a really neat looking other building to rent out on the property.
We had another great stay at The Wren House. Summer is even better then Winter. Beautiful and peaceful.

We loved our stay at the Wren House. Being surrounded by trees and singing birds and nothing else was just the break from the city we were looking for. Unfortunately it was incredibly hot and muggy so we didn’t explore (the AC worked great!), but we made great use of the screened in porch in the mornings and evenings. The fireflies were amazing- so many!

This little get away spot was perfect. Everything was very good and we had everything we needed. The cabin itself is so very pretty. I loved the craftsmanship and care put into every detail. The screen porch was my favorite place to be listening to the birds and sitting in the hammock swings. It was good for my soul.

The Wren House is a lovely place to stay. It was beyond clean; it was spotless. Because we were there to watch our son play baseball in nearby Danville, we didn't get the opportunity to enjoy the walk down to the river, but we did enjoy sitting on the screened in porch each night and seeing the fireflies and occasional wildlife. I enjoyed the porch each morning while getting a little work done before going to baseball games in the afternoon. Our hosts were great. In short, we came to the area just to see our son play baseball; the Wren house made it a relaxing vacation, also. We will always look to stay there when in the area, and I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a clean, safe, relaxing place to stay.
Wren house was a great escape while being on the road for work. The place was very nice and clean. The host were also very nice and were nearby for any needs. Would definitely stay here again.
Amazing spot! A great space for relax
A very comfortable space to be around nature- whether enjoying it on the trails in the yard, from the screened in porch, or inside through the big windows.

My daughter used this house to get ready for her and her bridalmaids for her wedding. It was a wonderful place and a lot of woods to take some gorgeous pictures. The home owners were wonderful and very helpful. My family wants to come back to visit just to stay here.

One word: INCREDIBLE!
We loved this place & had a wonderful stay. I highly recommend & hope to return sometime soon. If you're interested in birding, dark skies for stargazing, communing with nature, or just want to stay somewhere cool, stay at The Wren House. We experienced all of the above & then some.
We brought food & I recommend the same, just for convenience since stores are a bit of a drive away. There were utensils available for cooking & eating on-site... we made a delicious dinner & enjoyed it immensely. Everything we needed was right there.
And really... just the overall experience of staying in such a unique space was wonderful. The enclosed porch was my favorite. The hosts were so kind & accommodating. Inspiring.
If you're considering... just book it already 😊
This is such a beautiful place. Lots of natural surroundings and the living quarters are very cozy. I loved staying here and will come again!

My partner and I had such a relaxing couple of days. The wren house was very clean and the smell of the wood was to die for. We explored the land but spent most of our time on the porch playing chess and listening to the birds.
Wren House is like a delightful nature getaway. I have never seen so many different birds without leaving my very comfy hammock chair!

Wren House did not disappoint! Fun quiet getaway for a long weekend. Lots of time spent on the patio listening and watching the birds, and of course, time relaxing in the sauna. We check scout Sonrise Farms and Prairie Farm - worth the outings.

This place is gorgeous. I spent hours on the screened in porch watching birds, deer, raccoons, squirrels, and even a beaver! I was here for a work trip, and staying in this sweet little place turned it into a mini-vacation. A lot of love has gone into this land and home.

My wife and I loved our stay at Wren House. It provide a perfect respite from our routine and stress. We enjoyed the sauna, the hammock chairs and loved trekking on the property. Dave took the time to explain how to access some of the local running spots. We cannot wait to come back. The listing for Wren House is so much better in person!
**sent a private review
a wonderful place to stay to be tucked in nature
Absolutely adorable and impeccably decorated get-away.

What a lovely cabin this is! A treasure in central Illinois. A well-furnished, thoughtfully-designed space with an amazingly relaxing sauna. We refer to this place as our "spa," since it's so close to home. This is a gorgeous, well-appointed home-away-from-home that we love so much. A nice, spacious open floor plan on the first floor (good for people with mobility challenges) and so full of light. The hosts are always kind and friendly too. I couldn't recommend more!

Our stay was absolutely wonderful! The hosts, Debbie & Dave, provided excellent communication, directions, and additional information that made our stay smooth, comfortable, and hassle free. The property itself is absolutely adorable, comfortably furnished, and nicely decorated and is overall a great place to rest and relax. If we had more time, we would have loved exploring the wooded 15 acres more! Located directly off the highway outside of the main drag of Potomac, yet nestled in the woods, it is both extremely convenient, yet has the secluded feel of a cabin getaway. The property was impeccably clean and stocked with anything and everything you may need (pots, pans, cooking utensils, extra blankets, etc). The screened porch was our favorite part! It was so nice to start our day with a cup of coffee while listening to the sounds of the creek and watching the local wildlife. Everything was clean, well cared for, and welcoming. We will definitely be staying here again!
We loved our stay. What a perfect cozy nature retreat! The space was lovely, and we enjoyed the screened in porch and sauna even in the winter.

I love this place. Ihave stayed here several times. The host responds quickly. The house is close to theirs but they give us privacy which I appreciate. The house is clean, relaxing and smells good. The screened in porch and hammock chairs are our favorites for sure. Even in the winter. We saw a blue heron which was neat.

WOW! What a peaceful getaway. My husband, our 2 year old, and I felt so spoiled staying here over the weekend. Even though it was chilly outside the property was so beautiful to explore and the house itself was gorgeous. We used the sauna a few times and enjoyed that as well. Dave, Debbie, and Joel are so kind and caring and we are so blessed that they opened their home to us. We look forward to scheduling a time to come back in the summer for another getaway.

If I could give 10 stars I would! Everything about this house was perfect down to every detail. The bed was comfortable, and the dimmable lighting was really nice in the whole house. It has a beautiful kitchen and bathroom, and we especially loved the heated floors. Dave and Debbie are extremely friendly and always communicated quickly, it almost felt like we were family. The sauna was relaxing and just what we needed after some walks to explore the nature around us. We would love to stay here again!

Wonderful place to stay while in the area. House is clean and meticulously designed. The porch, the sauna and the kitchen will make you want to stay forever. Communication with Debbie and Dave were great and they accommodated every request. Truly wonderful hosts. Hoping to come back soon.

Our family has needed to observe strict COVID distancing guidelines, so we were looking for a place to get away that was near our home where we could relax with some spa-type amenities. The Wren House and sauna were perfect. It is accessible - level floors and doorways with low shower lip access and a seat, as well as easy, level access to the sauna (for wheelchair or other accessibility support needs) paired with very comfortable bedding and seating. We used the sauna the maximum amount over the 2 nights and final morning of our stay. We feel deeply refreshed from our mini-spa vacation! The hosts were both helpful to get oriented on how to use the sauna and other amenities and gave us our privacy.
We would book this location again, as a quick weekend getaway, any time! If you're in central Illinois and just want a writing retreat or quick refresher, this place is wonderful. We were there in winter, which was beautiful for sure, but the middle fork river and forest that surround the house are undoubtedly beautiful in Spring, Summer and Autumn. If we go in warm weather, we would certainly kayak and have a bonfire! We could not recommend this location more highly.
We spend great time in this house,very clean.Thank you.We recommend😍

A tranquil place, easy to get to and great hosts.
The lodging is first rate and clean. Great kitchen and bedrooms. Big, comfy bathroom and shower.
The trees and rivers bring peace to the head and heart. The quiet and darkness is soothing to the soul. In just a few short days, being unplugged and away during this moment was much needed.
And oh, the sauna, so nice.
We're planning our spring return already.
Thanks, Tracy and Danny

The Wren house is a wonderful location. There were 3 of us and we had plenty of room. We stayed in December, but still got to see a lot of wildlife in the woods behind the house. The house was spotless and very comfortable. The owners are very nice and helpful. We will definitely stay there again!

This place is a real gem. Debbie and Dave are amazing hosts and will go above and beyond to make sure that your stay is comfortable. The house and property are beautiful and so well put together. There are so many little details that really elevate the experience. Also, this is the perfect place to stay if you are hoping to visit Middle Fork State Park as it is just a short drive away. I can't recommend this stay enough!

The Wren House was a perfect spot for a quick getaway from the city. The place was nestled in the woods and looking out the windows you’d almost think you were in a tree house. I kept my binoculars handy and saw many birds and deer during my stay.
The kitchen had all of the basics I needed to cook a few meals during my stay. As the hosts say, I would highly recommend bringing your own groceries.
The house is a short drive from the Kickapoo State Recreation Area which has many fine hiking and mountain bike trails.

Wren House is a gem, period ! The wooded area behind the house is something from poems and we loved our morning walks on the property. My favorite part, though, was enjoying coffee on the open-air patio.

Buy groceries off 74 before venturing out to the rental. Very few stores close by. Kitchen has just about everything you need. Google maps thinks the property is on the left if you are travelling north, it is actually on the right. Long driveway to the rental attached to owner's home.
Debbie and Dave were great hosts! Their place was so beautiful. The scenery around the house is so pretty. It was a great place to relax and wind down for the weekend.
The perfect place to unwind and enjoy nature! The hosts are super lovely and kind people. I'd reccomend checking out Kickapoo state park- great mountain bike trails

Debbie and Dave’s space is a great place to stay if you’re looking for a peaceful getaway. We spent most of our time in the porch listening to the bird songs in the morning and the concert in the woods during the night. Having the porch as an extended living space (w/o mosquitos) was well thought out. The addition of the swings was the perfect touch. The indoors was cozy and just the right size for the four of us. The kitchen was well stocked with kitchenware but definitely take everything edible in since stores aren’t close. Take your yoga mat, a good book, board games, and put your phone on mute!

Beautiful house! It smelled of cedar, which was wonderful. The view of the woods was inspiring and beautiful, and I felt very safe since the hosts were close by. Dave and Debbie were quick to respond to any questions and were very friendly, but also respected my privacy. It was a wonderful retreat from the world.
great little place in the woods. There's an awesome path to the river, and plenty of woods to explore. The house is brand new, and super nice and clean. Hosts are super friendly and accommodating

Very attractive and comfortable apartment. We enjoyed the screened in dining space which is bordered by woods. Enjoyed listening to the birds. Friendly hosts. Spacious kitchen. Lots of hiking nearby. Enjoyed Forest Glen Preserve in particular. Would recommend.
Debbie & Dave were perfect hosts & great company. We loved relaxing, enjoying the property, & getting out to hike Kickapoo. We’ll be back!

This place is fantastic - exactly the spot to be if you want to be somewhere quiet and relaxing. Debbie and Dave are extremely responsive, friendly and kind. We will definitely plan to be back! They also have a sauna that you can use. The place has a bedroom and a fun/cool loft area as second room. Modern lofty vibe. Screened porch with hammock was where we spent most of our time reading and having meals. Buy your groceries before you arrive as closest store about 20-25 mins drive away. Overall a wonderful vacation and much needed relaxation.

Staying at the Wren House exceeded our expectations. The space was airy and spotless, and the property is beautiful. It rained much of the weekend, so we spent a lot of time on the screened-in porch, which almost gives the feeling of being in a treehouse. When it wasn’t raining, we did some hiking at Kickapoo State Park and spent an afternoon at Sleepy Creek Winery—both about 30 minutes away. Debbie and Dave were fantastic hosts, and we can’t wait to stay at the Wren House again.
This is a beautiful place

The Wren House is the perfect place for a weekend gateway for our girls trip. Hands down our favorite part was the screened in porch with hammocks that overlooked the forest leading to the river. If we were not out by the river or hiking, we were out on the screened in porch taking in the beautiful landscape. The hosts were fantastic, quick to respond, and they even built us a fire one night. The house was adorable and had everything we needed. It really was the perfect place and is on our list to go back to!
Absolutely loved the Wren house. It was so peaceful, the perfect place to relax. Host were hospitable and very friendly.
Nice views!! Beautiful place
Nice, quiet stay as advertised. Unit is attached, separated from owner's home by garage. Plenty of space, parking, etc.

such a beautiful cabin with great care put into every detail about the place. debbie is a very kind host and we had an amazing time hanging out in the house, and also wandering down to the river to take a dip! truly a dream!

Debbie and Dave were very kind and accommodating and the Wren House was perfect! It’s so peaceful to just sit out on the screened in porch and listen to everything around you. It’s a wonderful place for a relaxing get away.

Location was very pretty and peaceful. The house was Gorgeous, with the cedar that was used in the house it made it smell really nice. We really enjoyed eating breakfast while reading in the enclosed porch in the mornings. The hosts Debbie and Dave were really nice and even made us a bonfire one night which we really appreciate. All around it was a really nice trip!

10/10 recommend! Read the listing because no joke, there’s nothing around but a Casey’s and Dollar General but the property is the perfect escape for city life. Dave and Debbie live in an attached home and couldn’t be sweeter or more helpful! We will definitely be back
The hosts were very welcoming and stocked the Airbnb with everything you could have possibly needed. The home is clean and peaceful. It's a great place to go and reset. We'll be back!
This house is a beautiful getaway with lovely hosts!

Clean and beautiful! It rained most of the time but we enjoyed listening to it on the porch. the place had everything we needed and the owners were responsive and kind. Love that they tell you about the property. thanks for a great stay!

Great place on the Middle Fork of the Vermillion. We used it for a river trip base camp and it was ideal. The location is nice for driving to the rivers and parks. The screened in porch off the back is a very nice oasis in the evening. The hosts were very friendly, hospitable and helpful. The place was very clean and well kept. It could not have been a better experience! Except the river could have been a little higher!

The Wren House was absolutely perfect. It had everything we needed. It was very clean and everything was in beautiful condition. Our favorite part was the screened balcony with the two hammocks- we were there the majority of our stay. I would definitely love to come back in the fall. I recommend this house 100000%!
Amazing and beautiful retreat!
Our stay at the Wren House was a great nature retreat! Debbie and Dave were awesome hosts. We recommend their tranquil setting!

Great place to stay. Lovely interior, with our favorite part: screened in porch with hammock chairs. Lots to look at and enjoy the piece and quiet at this location. The host is very nice and had superb communication. Definitely planning on staying again!
Great place and everyone really enjoyed their time
had a wonderfully relaxing time.
Very beautiful! Amazing screened-in porch overlooking the woods. Incredibly friendly hosts as well.

We had a wonderful time at the Wren House! What a beautiful little home. Windows everywhere looking out to trees, birds, and a river. A lovely screened-in porch with comfortable seating. Full kitchen and comfortable bed.
Wifi was very good on the whole, though it had two outages while we were there - one for about an hour and one for about 10 minutes. The rest of the time, the wifi was good enough to support me and my husband both on Zoom calls simultaneously with no lag.
The hosts offered really special experiences to complement the gorgeous, comfortable home. They built us a fire so we could have a romantic evening by the river and helped us get fresh eggs from their chicken coop. They also showed us around the property and let us pet their dog. A great stay. Total privacy if you want it, and great support from the hosts if you want that. I highly recommend this home!

I can’t say enough wonderful things about this place. What a perfect getaway from the city for our little family! Every detail is thought out and beautiful. We had everything we needed and enjoyed cooking there. We loved the smell of the Cedar and being surrounded by the woods! It was the perfect place to unwind and detach. Debbie and her husband were welcoming and very responsive. They helped us find great hiking trails we could take our little babe on! I am hoping we can visit again!
This place was a perfect spot to stay while at a horse show in Gordyville. Wish we had time to explore the woods and sauna. Maybe next time. Loved it.
Loved all the little touches to the home to make it warm and inviting. I really, really loved the hammock swings on the porch! Thank you for a peaceful weekend!!

The Wren house is amazing, we heard a morning woodpecker, and evening coyotes while relaxing in the breezeway! We also got to see some of the wonderful foliage blooming during our early spring stay! Feeling relaxed and had a great time!

This place is so beautiful. Perfect for a relaxing vacation. We went there in March, but I think it's going to be even more beautiful in fall with all the tree colors changing. You can see the woods and the river through the windows and it's beautiful. Dave and Debbie were super helpful and always there to help us. This house was built recently so everything was brand new and clean.
Wonderful place! I came here with my two kids to escape the city. We had a relaxing experience and enjoyed the quiet. I would definitely stay here again!

Debbie and Dave built a really beautiful place. The sunlight comes pouring in all day and you're surrounded by trees and birds, right on the river. It's a very functional and comfortable space. The sauna is amazing and there are firepits to use as well- and fresh eggs from their chickens! Debbie and Dave are incredibly nice, interesting and fun to talk to. It was the perfect quiet, relaxing getaway.

The screened in porch might have been my favorite feature, we sat out there quite a bit during our stay. Everything was very clean and the space is so welcoming. We cooked all of our meals there so it was nice that the kitchen was well equipped. Debbie even left fresh flowers by the door for us while we were out one afternoon, it was a nice gesture. Definitely recommend Wren House.

This place is a gem! Our hosts were welcoming and Wren House is lovely. We did some hiking nearby, had a fire, enjoyed a sauna, and hung out on the back porch listening to birds! We will definitely be back. -Ellie and Candy

We couldn’t of had a better stay. The weather was nice for our kids to explore all the land they have. This place has everything you need and more. Fresh eggs from the chicken coop for breakfast and a nice sweat in the sauna before bed. We hope to come back over the summer to see all its beauty.
Great house and a great property.

A great spot to escape the city for a weekend - super clean and cozy, and the sauna was a treat! Very welcoming hosts, they even gave us some eggs from their chickens! Would love to come back in the spring or fall to explore the walking trails more. Highly recommend.

Our stay at the Wren House way exceeded our expectations! First off, the place is a gem. Newly built, thoughtfully constructed, and exceedingly comfortable thanks to the radiant flooring, despite temperatures that fell below 0 F while we were there. It's a bit hard to tell from the listing, but the Wren House is attached to the main house where Debbie and Dave live. So while it's not isolated, it still felt private. We weren't able to hear any noises from the house. The views of the woods and river from the house are amazing, and there is quite a bit of forested area on their property you can wander. There is a beautiful screened in porch that we would have used more if the weather had been better. The kitchen was well-equipped for cooking meals, and the mattress in the main bedroom was wonderfully comfortable. While we spent most of our time at the house, we did run a few errands in Champaign-Urbana which is just over half an hour away.
Debbie and Dave were incredibly hospitable and treated us like family. They welcomed us at check-in and said goodbye at check-out, and communicated very well via the Airbnb app and text. They gave some hiking recommendations and coordinated access to the sauna (so nice!!!), and even built a fire pit down by the river one evening of our stay.
We couldn't recommend the Wren House enough for a getaway weekend to relax, connect with nature, and enjoy Debbie and Dave's hospitality.

This place was the perfect getaway for three friends! Beautiful property with a ton of trees, plus access to nice hikes (plus some local tips from our hosts!). Everything was clean, contemporary, and very cozy. And the sauna! The sauna melted all the stress and cold of this winter away.
Absolutely beautiful home and location, especially with everything covered in the snow.

The Wren house is a lovely, quiet getaway. We loved how clean, bright, and quiet, and cozy it was. Our weekend at the Wren House offered a much needed secluded rest from the chaos of every day life. We would absolutely return and recommend this stay. Thanks Debbie!
The Wren house is the perfect escape from the city or a short get away. There is lots of hiking near by. Dave and Debbie were wonderful hosts!
Clean and peaceful and perfect!

Debbie and Dave have built a wonderful retreat at Wren House. The house is totally stunning and they have added many thoughtful touches that make for a comfortable stay. Debbie and Dave are wonderful hosts with lots of fantastic recommendations -- very hospitable folks!

Debbie and Dave's house is amazing! Our family of four had a most relaxing trip. From the moment we arrived we were overwhelmed by their hospitality and friendliness. Our kids loved sleeping in the loft and hanging out in the hammock chairs on the screened-in porch. They also loved greeting the chickens that hang around the property. The house is nestled in a beautiful wooded area and you will love waking up to the sunrise through the expansive windows. The sunsets are spectacular too! The house is very clean and comfortable. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful getaway!
This is a magnificent home. Very comfortable beds, lovely bathrooms/showers, large kitchen - it just all felt right. This home felt like home!
Great place for a family retreat!

Beautiful house, plenty of space to unwind as well as connect with my friends that joined me on this trip. Pristine clean - well thought out space - comfortable beds. Will stay here again - recommend to large groups/families.

We were coming back to the area for a family funeral and wanted something more personal and homey than a hotel. This modern farm house delivered - it was exactly what our family and my sister and her family were needing.
It's updated, well-equipped with supplies you may need, pristinely clean and beautifully decorated. This home made our visit back so much more wonderful and meaningful. Thank you.
Beautiful, clean, private and an absolute dream of a stay! Host Dave was very responsive and friendly! Highly recommend!
Beautiful 100 year old house that was exactly as described. Will be back again

Gorgeous setting, beautiful home everything was nice and clean. Big space so not everyone was on top of each other. Plenty of seating, plenty of parking for trucks trailers or vehicles you bring. Beautiful home. Will definitely stay there again.

Such a perfect place. Beautiful surroundings. Home was very clean and comfortably furnished.
We would definitely recommend to anyone needing a spacious home.
Yes. There is not a hotel in town and having Dave's house was great.

I gave you a “4” for accurate description because I did not notice you mention an additional 1/2 bath on 1st floor. That was wonderful to find.
